entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Templates.Mvc.Tests are failing on Helix builds #55695
    9.0.0
  • Consider increasing the default iteration count for PBKDF2 to follow OWASP recommendation #55690
  • ASP.NET Core with Angular throws Exception on startup after publish #55687
  • Unhandled exception rendering component: Could not load file or assembly #55686
  • NavigationException thrown in Static Server Render #55685
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ability to override `CssClass` property in `InputBase<T>` #55684
  • Allow more granular return types in signalR #55683

Closed

  • Inconsistent translation of template strings #46301
    Infrastructure
  • Use FrozenDictionary where appropriate #47569
    9.0.0
  • Investigate Blazor WebAssembly startup performance characteristics #54353
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext #55681
  • Switch JSON serializer usage over to new source generator APIs #31877
    9.0-preview5
  • [Static Web Assets] Runtime APIs to consume the generated endpoint manifest from the SDK #54875
    9.0-preview5
  • Performance Challenges of Blazor Server Applications in Low Bandwidth Environments Compared to MVC and Traditional Web Applications #55671
  • Security Claims not Identifying Expiration Time. #55333
  • Binding to IFormFileCollection results in empty collection #55174
  • Blazor Bug in LONG data type #55521

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset exception handling behavior in tests #55698
    area-infrastructure
  • Temporarily skip MVC tests on Helix #55696
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24262.2 #55688
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.6
  • [Blazor] Adds compresion support for all assets in an application #55558
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Relocate webtransport streams initialisation from HTTP3 connection accept loop to streams type #55425
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use DisposeAsync in FileStreamResultExecutor #55524
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Make DefaultProblemDetailsFactory public #55666
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add .NET 9 nightly NuGet feed and remove .NET 7 #55680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
